name: claude-auto-responder
description: Automatically respond to Claude CLI prompts in VS Code terminal

commands.title: Claude Auto Responder: Toggle Auto Mode
Claude Auto Responder: Start Claude Terminal
Claude Auto Responder: Send Yes and Don't Ask (2)
Claude Auto Responder: Toggle Debug Mode
Claude Auto Responder: Toggle Continuous Mode
Claude Auto Responder: Resume Continuous Mode

claudeAutoResponder.autoResponseDelaySec.description: Number of seconds to wait before sending auto-response (1-300 seconds)

claudeAutoResponder.enableDontAskAgain.description: (⏩) Enable auto-response for 'Yes, and don't ask again this session' with '2'

claudeAutoResponder.enableTerminalBuffer.description: (⬇️) Enable periodic arrow down key to refresh terminal buffer every 60 seconds

claudeAutoResponder.logSkippedQuestions.description: (ℹ️) Log skipped questions and responses to .claude-skipped-questions.log

claudeAutoResponder.ignoreDestructiveCom.description: (⚠️⚠️⚠️) Ignore destructive command detection and proceed with auto-response

claudeAutoResponder.customBlacklist.description: Custom list of destructive command patterns to detect (regex supported)

claudeAutoResponder.enableContinuousMode.description: Enable continuous mode to automatically send 'Continue.' when Claude is idle

claudeAutoResponder.continuousTimeoutMin.description: Minutes to wait before sending 'Continue.' in continuous mode (must be longer than auto-response delay)

claudeAutoResponder.idleSleepPreventionM.description: Minutes of idle time before automatically pausing sleep prevention (caffeinate)

claudeAutoResponder.enableUsageLimitAuto.description: Automatically switch to temporary Continuous mode when usage limit is detected, then return to Auto mode when limit is resolved
